Feature: Test CRUD API for pets

  Scenario: cleanup
    When send "delete" to "http://springboot:8080/pets"
    Then expect response code "200"

  Scenario: POST a pet
    Given following json
  """
  {
    "name": "Cat"
  }
  """
    When send "POST" to "http://springboot:8080/pets"
    Then expect response code "201"
    And json attribute "["message"]" is equal to "pet created"
    And json attribute "["data"][0]["id"]" exists
    And json attribute "["data"][0]["name"]" is equal to "Cat"


  Scenario: GET endpoint
    When send "get" to "http://springboot:8080/pets"
    Then expect response code "200"
    And json attribute "" has length "1"
    And json attribute "[0]["name"]" is equal to "Cat"

  Scenario: POST a pet with ID - error response
    Given following json
  """
  {
    "id": "999",
    "name": "Cat"
  }
  """
    When send "POST" to "http://springboot:8080/pets"
    Then expect response code "400"
    And json attribute "["message"]" is equal to "Id in POST must be empty! Provided id: 999"

  Scenario: cleanup
    When send "delete" to "http://springboot:8080/pets"
    Then expect response code "200"
